QuestData.Title: A New Life for Undeath
QuestData.Description:
It seems that you are full of surprises, $n. With the blessing of the Valkyra queen, you have opened a path that will shape the destiny of Azeroth.
I invite you to bear witness, for today a new day dawns on the Forsaken!
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow Sylvanas into the Vault of Eyir.
